text: Anusha Damayanthi () (born February 11, 1978) is an actress in Sri Lankan cinema and television. She won Dance Stars Dance reality show title in 2011 which was telecast on Swarnavahini. ==Theater work== She has acted few stage dramas. Her first stage acting came through Indian Sagare drama directed by Sisil Gunasekara. She then acted on Vaniciye Twinsla, and Dancing Super Star. ==Television== She contested for the reality dance program Dance Stars Dance and won the competition. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%;" |- style="text-align:center;" !
